segments.text: Please forgive me for rushing into your room forgetting to knock at the door .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm so sorry to disturb you so early .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm dreadfully sorry . I forgot to book the tickets yesterday .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I let you down . I'll make it up to you somehow .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Not a bit of it , don't blame yourself .
segments.speaker: S2
